DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate safety efficacy RGH-896 patient diabetic peripheral neuropathic pain .
DOC.brief_title: Study Safety Efficacy RGH-896 Patients With Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathic Pain
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient 18 75 year age A diagnosis painful diabetic neuropathy Controlled blood glucose Willingness wash analgesic medication use DPNP Female patient either postmenopausal , surgically sterile , practice medically acceptable method contraception Female patient pregnant Acute infection cardiac problem Past use pregabalin History severe psychiatric disorder History amputation due diabetes History seizure disorder Active diabetic foot ulcer
